name: Roll in One (Big Roy)
description:
A short puzzle game about playing golf with dice.

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move

Q/E to rotate view

R to restart hole

Space to advance to next hole after clearing a hole

A game by Trent Baker (trent.cool)

Audio credits:

https://freesound.org/people/ArtOrDie/sounds/170294/

https://freesound.org/people/AGFX/sounds/20430/
